languages.text: "На удивление разумный план. Я ожидал бы чего-то менее рассудительного и более... кровожадного".
"A surprisingly sensible plan. I expected something less judicious and more... bloodthirsty."
languages.original_text: "На удивление разумный план. Я ожидал бы чего-то менее рассудительного и более... кровожадного".

traits.locale_text: "A surprisingly sensible plan. I expected something less judicious and more... Bloodthirsty."
"A surprisingly sensible plan. I expected something less judicious and more... Bloodthirsty."

"A surprisingly sensible plan. I expected something less judicious and more... bloodthirsty."

languages.text: «Un plan sorprendentemente sensato. Esperaba algo menos juicioso y más... sanguinario».
languages.original_text: "A surprisingly sensible plan. I expected something less judicious and more... bloodthirsty."

traits.locale_text: «Un plan sorprendentemente sensato. Esperaba algo menos juicioso y más... sanguinario».

languages.text: 「驚くほど賢明な計画ですね。私はもっと…血に飢えた、賢明でないものを想像していました」
languages.original_text: "A surprisingly sensible plan. I expected something less judicious and more... bloodthirsty."

traits.locale_text: 「驚くほど賢明な計画ですね。私はもっと…血に飢えた、賢明でないものを想像していました」

languages.text: “这是个非常明智的计划。我本以为他们的计划不会这么聪明，而会更加……嗜血。”
languages.original_text: "A surprisingly sensible plan. I expected something less judicious and more... bloodthirsty."

traits.locale_text: “这是个非常明智的计划。我本以为他们的计划不会这么聪明，而会更加……嗜血。”

languages.text: "Ein überraschend vernünftiger Plan. Ich hatte mit weniger Klugheit und mehr ... Blutrunst gerechnet."
languages.original_text: "A surprisingly sensible plan. I expected something less judicious and more... bloodthirsty."

traits.locale_text: "Ein überraschend vernünftiger Plan. Ich hatte mit weniger Klugheit und mehr ... Blutrunst gerechnet."

languages.text: « Un plan étonnamment avisé. Je m'attendais à quelque chose de moins judicieux et de plus... sanglant. »
languages.original_text: "A surprisingly sensible plan. I expected something less judicious and more... bloodthirsty."

traits.locale_text: « Un plan étonnamment avisé. Je m'attendais à quelque chose de moins judicieux et de plus... sanglant. »

languages.text: "Şaşırtıcı şekilde mantıklı bir plan. Sağduyudan yoksun ve daha... Kana susamış bir şeyler beklemiştim."
languages.original_text: "A surprisingly sensible plan. I expected something less judicious and more... bloodthirsty."
